resources.string:
Developed by Miguel Peachey. 




Marketplace Simulator is a game based on the trade of products. Purchase items in the marketplace and sell them for profit. Items may or may not sell due to demand. Selling an item at a price not worth its value can affect the user's reputation. Down voting other sellers can result in their reputation lowering, too.
Our company applies our best effort with delivering our vendors with quality-based clothes, finely threaded and safely packaged with care. We focus on trends and society\'s demands.
Made from environmentally friendly Japanese silk and purely organic material, our high end clothing can fit any occasion.
Need to stock up on clothes fast? We have got you covered. Our wide range of stock is endless and cheap, packaged and ready to be shipped.
